property.name: ssl.client.truststore.location
property.description: Truststore to be used by NN and DN. Must be specified.

property.name: ssl.client.truststore.type
property.description: Optional. The keystore file format, default value is "jks".

property.name: ssl.client.truststore.reload.interval
property.description: Truststore reload check interval, in milliseconds. Default value is 10000 (10 seconds).

property.name: ssl.client.keystore.location
property.description: Keystore to be used by NN and DN. Must be specified.

property.name: ssl.client.keystore.type
property.description: Optional. The keystore file format, default value is "jks".
